title: Desecrated Vatican altar purified after naked protest
description: A desecrated Vatican altar underwent purification after a man jumped on it naked in a form of protest against the war in Ukraine earlier this week.

title: India PM says 'the guilty' for deadly train crash will get 'harshest punishment'
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has said people found "guilty" for the deadly train crash in India will receive the "harshest punishment".

title: India train crash: How safe is the country's rail network?
India train crash: How safe is the country's rail network?
description: The deadly crash at Odisha's Balasore district on Friday, which has so far claimed over 280 lives and injured 900 more, has focused attention on the safety of the railway network in the world's second most populous country.

title: Erdogan sworn is as Turkey's president for unprecedented third term
description: Recep Tayyip Erdogan has taken his oath to be sworn in as Turkey's president for an unprecedented third time.

title: Three Israeli soldiers killed after incident on Egyptian border
description: Three Israeli soldiers have been killed in a major incident on the Egyptian border on Saturday morning.

title: One dead and dozens left homeless after fire rips through building in Rome
description: One person is dead and at least nine have been injured after a large fire at a seven-storey building in Rome.
